Hey there everyone,

My name is Agness Chisale and I am a master's student at UBC. I hold a Bachelor's Degree in Environmental Management from the University of Malawi , and  I am currently studying a Master of Geomatics for Environmental Management at UBC . My goal is to become a very experienced  GIS analyst. During my free time, i like to socialize with friends, paint and also hike.
